name: Detective Agency Gray Tie 2 - Collector's Edition
name_original: Detective Agency Gray Tie 2 - Collector's Edition
description:
AviGames presents the second game from the Detective Agency "Gray Tie" series. This exciting game is packed with beautiful locations, diverse and interesting ways of searching for items, as well as new mini-games.
In this mysterious detective story, you will help detectives find a stolen picture and solve the crime.
Professional detectives Amanda and her assistant take up the case. You will arrive in France to meet the artist, Jovanni Rosen, who will ask you to find his magnum opus painting. The investigation will bring you to various secret places. You’ll be chasing the robber and get very unexpected results. You will get to the black market and find some cool technical devices for criminals. Follow the culprit step by step and get caught in his clever traps. You will visit the observatory and TV studio and find out the truth about the theft.

This special Collector’s Edition release is full of exclusive extras you won’t find in the standard version.
The Collector’s Edition includes:

* 8 extra locations with even more things to find!
* 8 more mini-games to complete!
* Downloadable wallpapers!
* Listen to the soundtrack!
* Find interesting evidence and add them to the storage!
* 12 more mini-games for those who love playing them.
